mapper.sql: F_C_${str}_id as f_C_X_id, F_C_${str}_jc as f_C_X_jc, F_C_${str}_bm as f_C_X_bm, F_C_${str}_bzbmz as f_C_X_bzbmz, F_C_${str}_qc as f_C_X_qc, F_C_${str}_sm as f_C_X_sm, F_C_${str}_qtxx as f_C_X_qtxx
mapper.select: select from T_C_${str} where F_C_${str}_jc like '%${f_C_X_jc}%'
mapper.insert:
insert into T_C_${str}
F_C_${str}_id,
F_C_${str}_jc,
F_C_${str}_bm,
F_C_${str}_bzbmz,
F_C_${str}_qc,
F_C_${str}_sm,
F_C_${str}_qtxx,
#{tcx.f_C_X_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tcx.f_C_X_jc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tcx.f_C_X_bm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tcx.f_C_X_bzbmz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tcx.f_C_X_qc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tcx.f_C_X_sm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tcx.f_C_X_qtxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update T_C_X
F_C_X_jc = #{f_C_X_jc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_C_X_bm = #{f_C_X_bm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_C_X_bzbmz = #{f_C_X_bzbmz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_C_X_qc = #{f_C_X_qc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_C_X_sm = #{f_C_X_sm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_C_X_qtxx = #{f_C_X_qtxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where F_C_X_id = #{f_C_X_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update T_C_X set F_C_X_jc = #{f_C_X_jc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_C_X_bm = #{f_C_X_bm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_C_X_bzbmz = #{f_C_X_bzbmz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_C_X_qc = #{f_C_X_qc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_C_X_sm = #{f_C_X_sm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_C_X_qtxx = #{f_C_X_qtxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where F_C_X_id = #{f_C_X_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
